room_title: Escape room "The Garage" by D.O.A. Room Escape in Chicago
review: Fun place that gives your brain a workout. Looking forward to going back and checking out the other room. Staff was helpful and fun. Awesome experience. Great job DOA!

room_title: Escape room "The Garage" by D.O.A. Room Escape in Chicago
review: Such a fun time and well worth the money. Looking forward to coming back to do another room. Worth every penny.

room_title: Escape room "The Garage" by D.O.A. Room Escape in Chicago
review: Didn't figure out the Garage but we had a great time trying. We were so close. One clue we didn't find ended it for us. Thank you so much for the great time and great room. I can not wait to return!

room_title: Escape room "The Garage" by D.O.A. Room Escape in Chicago
review: This is so much fun! It also is a different type of night out where you get to work your brain! I highly recommend everyone to try it. The people who run it are a lot of fun as well!!

room_title: Escape room "The Garage" by D.O.A. Room Escape in Chicago
review: So much fun! A great time I will recommend to everyone! Also will be coming back for more!

room_title: Escape room "The Garage" by D.O.A. Room Escape in Chicago
review: Awesome! If you are looking for something totally different to do, stop here.  It takes all kinds of thinkers to make it out of the room, so don't think you have to be a genius. The staff are super nice.

room_title: Escape room "The Garage" by D.O.A. Room Escape in Chicago
review: We failed again! We do this for date night and talk about it daily. We tried has a couple and came close. Our second try was with ten people we didn't know. Both attempts were fun. Two times and so close, we've always left saying what if! After trying two rooms and two different experiences, we have no complaints. I'm still kicking myself for missing a step I'm sure would've given our team the extra time needed to escape! Money well spent!! If forced to make a complaint it'd be we won't have another room to solve for awhile. It's not a complaint because it's obvious it takes a lot of time to develop each room. We can't wait for the next adventure.
